skillTree.localised_description: Feel the fire, then live it.

effects.description:
Attribute: Immune to Psychology for Infernal Guard (Fireglaives) units
	(own army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: The leaders of the Infernal Guard are clearly identifiable from their lavishly-decorated suits of armour …and the deafening roar of their voices when giving orders.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: The Father of Darkness protects his children from sorcery through a variety of magical means, all of them twisted and obscure.
Having a thing for hats can be most useful when everyone keeps aiming at your head…
Tamurkhan's march promises much wealth for the greedy, corrupt Dawi-Zharr; unsurprisingly, all at their capital are eager to profit.
With a weapon of sufficiently high calibre, a ready supply of ammunition, and no small amount of skill from the shooter, no target is too large to be brought down.

effects.description:
Bonus vs Large ammo for Chaos Dwarf Blunderbusses, Infernal Guard (Fireglaives) and Dreadquake Mortar units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The more you have available to spend, the greater the number of Labourers you can support.
With a seemingly never-ending supply train, this Infernal Castellan has all the firepower he needs at his stumpy, armoured fingertips.
"The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Professional soldiery means never running out of ammo at the crucial moment.
This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
What use armour, or even magical defences, against such powerful ordnance?
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A clever arrangement of lenses makes the target seem just that bit closer.
Death is always just a shot away.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
Arrows, cannonballs and more esoteric munitions are needed in endless supply on the battlefield.
These are no ordinary bullets, for they have been forged in Hashut's roiling, molten fires, will go further and explode on contact.

effects.description: "Explosive Bullets" ammunition (projectiles will cause explosive damage)

skillTree.localised_description: Engineering ingenuity extended to mining and excavation implements can also prove useful to a battlefield skirmisher.

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

skillTree.localised_description: The blackshard armour they wear protects the Infernal Castellan from much of the hurly-burly of battle, such as the worst effects of sizeable explosions.
At the forefront of the battle, covered in blood and gods only know what else, shooting, slashing and stabbing the foe to a screaming death – *that's* where you'll find this one.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: The Fire-Dwarfs' armouries are powered by a thousand immensely hot furnaces, from which all of their manufactured munitions are produced.
With so little rattle and recoil, a firearm can be kept stable enough to fire with greater accuracy from much further away.

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

skillTree.localised_description: Some loudly state their view that killing from a distance, and other "sneaky" tactics, are unvalorous and unbefitting of a warrior, but they're wrong, for it is an art.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

skillTree.localised_description: "Stand Back! These are Dawr, but this is only the milluzth attempt!"
As the hellforged bolts strike their target, their molten cores seep out, melting their defences and leaving them prone.
Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: Such magic-users may be wise and able to offer sage advice, especially if they have scried the region.

effects.description: Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 2%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 4%
Boost Income action: Income is modified by an additional 6%

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.
When bracing, this unit causes additional damage when attacking charging enemies.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

items.colour_text: To each of his Chieftains Tamurkhan granted a powerful talisman, to enhance their power, but also to yoke it to his own through Nurgle's immense will.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead
